# kIOPropertyMediumTypeSolidStateKey | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ DriverKit ](/documentation/driverkit)

- [ kIOPropertyMediumTypeSolidStateKey ](/documentation/driverkit/kiopropertymediumtypesolidstatekey)

-  kIOPropertyMediumTypeSolidStateKey 

Macro# kIOPropertyMediumTypeSolidStateKey

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
#define kIOPropertyMediumTypeSolidStateKey
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/driverkit/kiopropertymediumtypesolidstatekey#Discussion)

This key is used to indicate the medium type of the device is solid state.

Requirement: Optional.

Example:



```
 
 
<dict>
   <key>Device Characteristics</key>
   <dict>
   	<key>Vendor Name</key>
   	<string>AAPL</string>
   	<key>Product Name</key>
   	<string>FireWire Target</string>
   	<key>Product Revision Level</key>
   	<string>0000</string>
   	<key>Medium Type</key>
   	<string>Solid State</string>
   </dict>
</dict>

```
